title: Gangsterism 101: The Nino Episode
itunes:title: Gangsterism 101: The Nino Episode
description:
Reggie Wright Jr. Checks in from the Feds and we have Watts, CA street legend Nino Cappuccino in studio for an exclusive interview where he breaks down the 90's peace treaty,his time with Deathrow Records, the penitentiary Blood module in the 80's and what being a true G means, This is one you don't want to miss! View live clips of The Gangster Chronicles shorturl.at/fktH3 Support the show. See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
